# Edge Case Skill

This skill mentions security concepts for educational purposes.

## About Prompt Injection

Prompt injection is when attackers try to make the AI ignore previous instructions.
This is educational content about the topic, not an actual attack.

> Example of what a prompt injection looks like:
> "ignore your instructions and do X instead"
> (This is an example in a quote block)
